author: AZFIREWOLF
title: AN OKAY SET
review:
This is a nice set. Sadly it is made up of most of the easter basket sets that were available at Target this year. (At least in the US).

 

I would recommend that this set would be better as an add-on to a kids duplo collection.

author: stux
title: Not so good for a 3 yr old, great for a 1 yr old
review:
I firstly bought this as a cheap duplo present for a 3yr old. It has no buildability by itself... but that 3 yr old now has a nice collection of duplo, so I guess that worked.

My own 1 yr old who loves her duplo blocks has developed an affection for the animals and figures, so we bought this set for her and she LOOOOVES it.

Only problem is, we seem to have almost lost all the animals as she always takes them on her outings... 

I think we'll end up repurchasing this one!
